# search for HMM hits

In this steps we use hmmsearch to find matches of the the HMM models in the `hmm/` folder to the genomic collection in the `genomes/` folder. 

```{bash, eval=F}
parallel 'hmmsearch -E 0.0001 --domtblout {.}.domtblout_lysis hmm/lysis.hmm {}' ::: genomes/faa/*.faa
parallel 'hmmsearch -E 0.0001 --domtblout {.}.domtblout_colicin hmm/colicin.hmm {}' ::: genomes/faa/*.faa
```
